activities: Nardello acts on behalf of its individual and corporate clients and/or their legal counsel ("Clients") during its provision of any of the following services: computer forensics, litigation support, due diligence and/or related consulting services ("Services"). Personal information is collected in the EU (i) by the Client directly or by Nardello personnel at the Client's direction or (ii) sent to Nardello in the United States by the Client or a Nardello affiliate for processing. Data is then housed on secure servers in the United States which only Nardello personnel who have a need to access such information for the purpose of performing the Services may access. During its performance of Services, Nardello takes direction from its Clients as to what data it is authorized to process. Nardello’s Clients may also provide Personal Information to Nardello via its web-sites, including signing-up for various communications from Nardello. Nardello uses such data for the purposes of marketing, facilitating transactions and customer support.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, online and manually processed data.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
